title: When you carry a game so hard that even the mastery system acknowledges it

replies.body: Is 1337 a lot for mastery score?

> [{quoted}](name=LaceUp23,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Afqmy7dR,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-27T10:35:56.208+0000)
>
> Is 1337 a lot for mastery score?

Troll bait op
Because I didn't know if that was a good score? I mean, you practically get over 1k just for winning alone...

> [{quoted}](name=LaceUp23,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Afqmy7dR,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-07-27T10:58:33.938+0000)
>
> Because I didn't know if that was a good score? I mean, you practically get over 1k just for winning alone...

17'5 4 (0mpu73r l4ngu4g3. 17 g375 4nn0'/1ng 4f73r 4 wh1l3. 700 b4d 1f u (4n'7 r34d 7h15.  *Basically 1337 BUT not the software version*
Yeah, I can read that. Even after pointing out that it is goofy word stuff, I still don't get the significance of "leet".

> [{quoted}](name=LaceUp23,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Afqmy7dR,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2015-07-27T11:09:08.599+0000)
>
> Yeah, I can read that. Even after pointing out that it is goofy word stuff, I still don't get the significance of "leet".

whatever, not worth even trying to speak too.

Well that's pretty arrogant. That would be like you coming into my pharmacy and me saying it isn't even worth speaking to you because you don't know the mechanism of a drug. If you were going to be a dick about it, you didn't even have to comment in the first place.

http://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=1337

It's not scam or promoting a website, tryng to help you out
Lol, urban dictionary OP. If you want a laugh, search for Youngstown in it xD

> [{quoted}](name=ShuffledPancake,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Afqmy7dR,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2015-07-27T11:06:45.087+0000)
>
> 17'5 4 (0mpu73r l4ngu4g3. 17 g375 4nn0'/1ng 4f73r 4 wh1l3. 700 b4d 1f u (4n'7 r34d 7h15.  *Basically 1337 BUT not the software version*

It's a computer language. It gets annoying after a while. Too bad if you can't read this.
dunno but it's leet
What's leet mean?

> [{quoted}](name=LaceUp23,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Afqmy7dR,comment-id=000100020000,timestamp=2015-07-27T11:29:45.816+0000)
>
> What's leet mean?

Its hacker type slang for "elite". Hows life lacey?
Haha, thanks. And life is good. Just on my pharmacy rotations. Haven't killed anyone yet, so I guess that's a good thing. What you been up to?

> [{quoted}](name=LaceUp23,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Afqmy7dR,comment-id=00010002000000010000,timestamp=2015-07-27T17:50:45.080+0000)
>
> Haha, thanks. And life is good. Just on my pharmacy rotations. Haven't killed anyone yet, so I guess that's a good thing. What you been up to?

Work, life, love. Same as usual. =P
:O Does someone have a League GF??
http://knowyourmeme.com/memes/1337-speak
http://knowyourmeme.com/memes/1337-speak
*shrugs* i just thought it was humorous that it was 1337, my uber1337haxor gameplay
Oh, I don't know what that even is lol.
I love it when a game is 40 minutes in and the ADC still doesn't have Last Whisper. :D
they were so behind all game it wasnt funny, I thought for sure they'd reach our nexus through botlane before my first tower even fell

People not respecting the GP. Once he gets Phage he runs around fast as hell and super hard to lock down :3

Good luck in your promos!

Thanks! it'll be my second time this season once I get back in them, hopefully it goes better than the first lol. 

and yeah people who disrespect the parrrley and exploding barrels end up swimming with the fishes yaaarr
you forgot the Tiamat

Their team was mostly ranged magic damage dealers, as such I didnt  find it a worthwhile investment to get tiamat/hydra as i had to use a more hit-and-run strategy on an enemy team that was rarely clumped together. I instead focused on the MR/AD items
I was like... 'So he got to master 5? So what...' then I actually saw the score number and was like 'Oooooohhhhh'. Lol. Get them hax out of here!
